headline: 3 Top Dividend Stocks Offering At Least 3.3% Yield
summary: As the U.S. stock market experiences a period of volatility with banks and tech stocks leading indices higher amidst ongoing trade tensions, investors continue to seek stability in their portfolios. In this environment, dividend stocks offering attractive yields can provide a reliable income stream, making them an appealing choice for those looking to navigate uncertain economic conditions.

headline: Earnings Insight: Oil Refiners See Sharp Declines To Q1 Estimates
summary: Energy companies are facing a double headwind: proposed tariffs that threaten to dampen demand, and an unexpected increase in OPEC production that could raise global supply.
